     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Modern Art &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16932401">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16932401">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16932401">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16932401">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
           <br />
           <br />
           <a href="mailto:kcannon@muhlenberg.edu">
            Kelly Cannon
           </a>
           <br />
           Outreach and Scholarly
           <br />
           Communication Librarian,
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business
           <br />
           Subject Specialist
           <br />
           <br />
           phone: 484-664-3602
           <br />
           email:
           <a href="mailto:kcannon@muhlenberg.edu">
            kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           </a>
           <br />
           <br />
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16932401" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16932402">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16932402">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16932402">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16932402">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16932402" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16932403">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16932403">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16932403">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference Works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16932403">
          <div id="boxatt16932403" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19974008">
              <a id="link_19974008" href="http://library.muhlenberg.edu/search~S0?/tcredo+reference/tcredo+reference/1,6,79,B/frameset&amp;FF=tcredo+reference&amp;1,1," target="_blank" onclick="hit(19974008,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974008}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19974009">
              <a id="link_19974009" href="http://www.oxfordartonline.com/subscriber/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19974009,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974009}); ">
               Oxford Art Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The standard encyclopedic reference for the discipline. See especially the bibliography.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16932404">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16932404">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16932404">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16932404">
          <div id="boxatt16932404" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19973860">
              <a id="link_19973860" href="http://books.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19973860,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19973860}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Offers previews of books, with link to interlibrary loan.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24839942">
              <a id="link_24839942" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24839942,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16932405">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16932405">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16932405">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Periodicals
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16932405">
          <div id="boxatt16932405" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19973863">
              <a id="link_19973863" href="http://web.ebscohost.com/ehost/search/basic?sid=db34ff7e-2b45-414a-8d2d-0d7a4af2bcaa@sessionmgr4004&amp;vid=1&amp;tid=2003EB" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19973863,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19973863}); ">
               America History &amp; Life
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Subscription databases, in American history.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19973864">
              <a id="link_19973864" href="http://web.ebscohost.com/ehost/search/advanced?sid=71e8ef1f-0c62-4569-b7af-19c10756dedc%40sessionmgr4004&amp;vid=1&amp;hid=4104" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19973864,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19973864}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Subscription databases, in non-U.S. history.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19974019">
              <a id="link_19974019" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aft,air" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19974019,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974019}); ">
               Art Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Good starting place for art journals and art magazine, and includes the full text of many.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19974037">
              <a id="link_19974037" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19974037,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19973865">
              <a id="link_19973865" href="http://www.jstor.org.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19973865,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19973865}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. An archive for many scholarly journals including some in art history.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4605720" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16932406">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16932406">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16932406">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16932406">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides
            </em>
            .
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16932406" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16932407">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16932407">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16932407">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Interlibrary Loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16932407">
          Most any item not immediately available in our library or in the research databases can be requested on
          <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
           interlibrary loan
          </a>
          by filling out the appropriate form for
          <a href="https://library.muhlenberg.edu/illj~S0">
           articles
          </a>
          or
          <a href="https://library.muhlenberg.edu/illb~S0">
           books
          </a>
          .
          <div id="boxatt16932407" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>

    <div id="descpopup" class="balloon" style="visibility: visible; top:-200px; left:-500px;">
     <div id="descpopuptitle" class="balloon_head">
      <h6>
       Description
      </h6>
     </div>
     <div class="balloon_body" id="descpopupcontent">
      <p>

      </p>
     </div>
    </div>

     <div class="popup_head">

       </tr>
